function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in proportion of public green spaces in urban areas","Impact":"Reduced access to natural ecosystem services, decreased quality of life, and hindered sustainable development","Mitigation":"Implement policies to protect and increase public green spaces, and promote the development of urban green infrastructure","Technologies":"Urban planning and design technology, green infrastructure technology","People":"Urban residents, economically disadvantaged communities","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lifestyle changes due to the pandemic leading to longer socio-psychological and behavioral implications","Impact":"Increased mental and physical health problems, and significant challenges for the global population","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support services, promote healthy lifestyle initiatives, and invest in community support programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote mental health services, health and fitness apps","People":"Global population, communities affected by lifestyle changes","Owner":"Health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inequalities in access to green spaces and their impact on health","Impact":"Burden on economically disadvantaged communities, leading to intergenerational well-being problems","Mitigation":"Improve access to green spaces in disadvantaged neighborhoods, address socioeconomic inequalities, and invest in well-being programs for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, community mapping tools, urban development technology","People":"Economically disadvantaged communities, marginalized groups","Owner":"Urban planners, community development organizations"}]}
